reviews.review_content:
Professor Casselberry is amazing and inspiring.  I can't say enough about how wonderful she is and how great it was to listen to such great music for a class.  The class however is rather based on class discussion, which I didn't always find too illuminating.  I think that's more the fault of students rather that the professor.
Workload:
Three papers, a lot of reading but most of it is engaging.  Not bad, but also not a do-nothing class.
